com.fangcloud.sdk

Class YfyAppInfo

extends Object
    Identifying information about your application.

    • Method Detail

      • initAppInfo

        public static void initAppInfo(String key,
                               String secret)
        Must be invoked before sending any request
        Parameters:
        key - Fangcloud app key (see getKey())
        secret - Fangcloud app secret (see getSecret())

      • getKey

        public static String getKey()
        Returns the Fangcloud app key (OAuth calls this the consumer key). You can create an app key and secret on the Fangcloud developer website.
        Returns:
        Fangcloud app key

      • getSecret

        public static String getSecret()
        Returns the Fangcloud app secret (OAuth calls this the consumer secret). You can create an app key and secret on the Fangcloud developer website.

        Make sure that this is kept a secret. Someone with your app secret can impesonate your application. People sometimes ask for help on the Fangcloud API forums and copy/paste their code, which sometimes includes their app secret. Do not do that.

        Returns:
        Fangcloud app secret

      • getHost

        public static YfyHost getHost()
        Returns the Fangcloud host configuration.

        This is almost always YfyHost.DEFAULT. Typically this value will only be different for testing purposes.

        Returns:
        Fangcloud host configuration
